meaning_str.bing:
n. 挑战；质疑；质询；挑战书
v. 考查；盘问；对…怀疑（或质疑）；拒绝接受
网络. 向…挑战；挑战模式；叫板

考查；盘问；对…怀疑（或质疑）；拒绝接受

挑战；考验；质疑；免疫反应的刺激；免疫系统与病原体的接触；口令盘问；暗号盘问；反对；诘问；辩驳；对抗；竞争
质疑；怀疑；对…怀疑；挑战；邀请参加比赛；拒绝接受；对抗；提出异议；（尤指在对方不情愿时）强烈建议（某人做某事）；考验…的技巧；考查…的能力

1.en: I was finding it a challenge to keep another campaign commitment: cutting the White House staff by 25 percent.
1.cn: 我发现要兑现我的另一个竞选承诺也不容易：把白宫的工作人员的人数减少25%。

2.en: That was why the Delegation was pleased to see that WIPO had taken up the challenge, in the previous years.
2.cn: 这就是代表团很高兴看到WIPO在过去几年中迎接了该挑战的原因。

3.en: He said it was a major challenge to get world leaders to take the tourism industry seriously.
3.cn: 他表示，让世界各国领导严肃对待旅游业，是一项重大挑战。

0.en: This is a challenge I take personally.
0.cn: 这对于我来说是一个挑战。

1.en: That's fine. Sounds like a fun challenge.
1.cn: 没问题。听上去是个有趣的挑战。

2.en: You can challenge stereotypes, both subtle and obvious.
2.cn: 你们可以挑战老一套的做法。

3.en: I could use a challenge. It's getting pretty easy.
3.cn: 我可以接受挑战，那应该会很容易。

4.en: Now SpaceX is tackling an even greater challenge.
4.cn: 现在SpaceX正在应对更大的挑战。

5.en: Why was that necessary? Why did my brother challenge me?
5.cn: 我为何需要那样？我的亲兄弟为何要来挑战我？

6.en: John Sculley? President of Pepsi Cola. The Pepsi Challenge guy.
6.cn: 约翰 斯卡利，百事可乐的总裁。那个“百事挑战”家伙

7.en: How many guesses do you get? Six. Challenge extended. Deal. Challenge excepted.
7.cn: 你们能猜几次？六次。男生队下战书。赌就赌。女生队接受挑战。

8.en: Cowards, all of you! None of you rise to meet my challenge?
8.cn: 懦夫，你们全都是懦夫。你们谁都不敢和我挑战？

9.en: You want a real challenge, try keeping me from eating more of these.
9.cn: 你想来个真正的挑战吗，试试阻止我继续吃牛角包啊。

10.en: Now it is a challenge out there today, I know, but I wanna share something with you.
10.cn: 我知道，今天的确是个挑战，但我会给你回报的。

11.en: Because meeting a public health challenge like this isn't just a job for government.
11.cn: 因为应对一个像这样的公共卫生挑战，不仅仅是政府的工作。

12.en: I accept your challenge, if only to personally ripped the heart out of your pathetic body.
12.cn: 如果只是私人的，我接受你的挑战，我将撕开你可怜的身体，取出你的心脏。

13.en: And that's the spirit all of us can draw upon as Americans, as we meet this challenge together.
13.cn: 这正是我们所有人作为美国人在我们一起团结应对这一挑战时可以依靠的精神。

14.en: Now, here's the challenge. In order to feed us, every one of these outlets has to be supplied with food.
14.cn: 现在挑战来了，为了养活全美国的人，每一间这类的商店都必须提供食物。

15.en: Beyond the Wormhole, the crew will face a far greater challenge: To navigate the perils of a black hole.
15.cn: 超越了虫洞，宇航员将会面临艰巨得多的挑战：航行于黑洞的极大危险中.

16.en: And when I thought about my challenge, balancing risk and reward, I realized that risk and reward naturally go together.
16.cn: 当我考虑到自己的挑战，平衡风险和回报时，我意识到风险和回报是共存的。

17.en: That's hard enough, but there's an even bigger challenge, how to keep it constantly supplied with electricity nationwide.
17.cn: 那已经是艰巨的任务，但还有更大的挑战，怎么保证电流畅通保证全国的供电。

18.en: But the really interesting technical challenge for people here is, you know, every facebook experience is totally unique.
18.cn: 但这技术上的挑战对人们来说十分新奇，每一个脸书得到的经验都如此与众不同。

19.en: You think this is clever? Well, you know, they only give you three letters, so after A-S-S it is a bit of a challenge.
19.cn: 你觉得那么做很聪明？我只能写下三个字母，除了屁股外，其他的名字可是个大挑战。
